page.title: 19Holbeach Bank Village Fete
page.content: The playing field fete is held once _ every year. It is one of the biggest attractions around here. It has stalls, games and displays. The money raised goes into the maintenance of the village hall and playing field. Our school's gymnasts normally do a display. The gym display included vaulting and separate routines. There was a band called the Spalding Boys'and Girls' Brigade Band. This year the fete raised nearly Â£ 300. There were races and a fancy dress competition with money prizes. It attracts a lot of people and they nearly all take part in the activites.The fete starts at 2.30 pm and ends at 6.00 pm. There were plenty of refreshments of various kinds. There was a coconut shy and a bowling game and a throw the rolling pin competition.
